languages.text: "Их породила реликвия святого Когнация, а значит, они — творение, угодное Императору. Нужно напомнить людям об этом! Устрой прилюдное пострижение Блаженных в Орден Молота, с чтением притч о деяниях святого Когнация и его последователей".

"They were begotten by the relic of Saint Cognatius, which means their existence pleases the Emperor. Your people must be reminded that it is so! Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure to initiate the Touched into the Order of the Hammer and a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."
languages.original_text: "Их породила реликвия святого Когнация, а значит, они — творение, угодное Императору. Нужно напомнить людям об этом! Устрой прилюдное пострижение Блаженных в Орден Молота, с чтением притч о деяниях святого Когнация и его последователей".

traits.locale_text: "They were born by the relic of Saint Cognatius, which means they please the Emperor. We have to remind people of it! Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure into the Order of the Hammer for the Blessed, with a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."

"They were born by the relic of Saint Cognatius, which means they please the Emperor. We have to remind people of it! Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure into the Order of the Hammer for the Blessed, with a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."

Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure to initiate the Touched into the Order of the Hammer and a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."

Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure to initiate the Touched into the Order of the Hammer and a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."

Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure to initiate the Touched into the Order of the Hammer and a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."

Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure to initiate the Touched into the Order of the Hammer and a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."

"They were begotten by the relic of Saint Cognatius, which means their existence pleases the Emperor. Your people must be reminded that it is so! Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure to initiate the Touched into the Order of the Hammer and a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."

languages.text: “他们诞生于圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物之中，这意味着他们的存在本身取悦了帝皇。您的人民必须意识到这是帝皇的旨意！安排一场公开的剃度仪式，让受召者加入重锤修会。之后，再让他们参与进一场礼拜仪式，高声朗诵圣科尼亚蒂乌斯及其追随者的善举寓言。”
languages.original_text: "They were begotten by the relic of Saint Cognatius, which means their existence pleases the Emperor. Your people must be reminded that it is so! Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure to initiate the Touched into the Order of the Hammer and a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."

traits.locale_text: “他们诞生于圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物之中，这意味着他们的存在本身取悦了帝皇。您的人民必须意识到这是帝皇的旨意！安排一场公开的剃度仪式，让受召者加入重锤修会。之后，再让他们参与进一场礼拜仪式，高声朗诵圣科尼亚蒂乌斯及其追随者的善举寓言。”
“他们诞生于圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物之中，这意味着他们的存在取悦了帝皇。我们必须提醒所有人这一点！安排一场公开的剃度仪式，让受召者加入重锤修会。之后，再让他们参与进一场礼拜仪式，高声朗诵圣科尼亚蒂乌斯及其追随者的善举寓言。”

languages.text: «Surgieron de una reliquia de san Cognatius, lo que significa que su existencia complace al Emperador. ¡Su gente debe recordarlo! Prepare una ceremonia pública de tonsura para iniciar a los Tocados en la Orden del Martillo y un servicio dedicado a la lectura de parábolas sobre los actos de san Cognatius y sus seguidores».
languages.original_text: "They were begotten by the relic of Saint Cognatius, which means their existence pleases the Emperor. Your people must be reminded that it is so! Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure to initiate the Touched into the Order of the Hammer and a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."

traits.locale_text: «Surgieron de una reliquia de san Cognatius, lo que significa que su existencia complace al Emperador. ¡Su gente debe recordarlo! Prepare una ceremonia pública de tonsura para iniciar a los Tocados en la Orden del Martillo y un servicio dedicado a la lectura de parábolas sobre los actos de san Cognatius y sus seguidores».

languages.text: 「彼らは聖コグナティウスの聖遺物によって生まれたので、皇帝を喜ばせていることになります。それを民に思い出させなければなりません！触れられし者を鉄槌の修道会に加入させるための公の洗礼式と、聖コグナティウスとその信者たちの行為についての寓話を朗読するための儀式を手配するのです」
languages.original_text: "They were begotten by the relic of Saint Cognatius, which means their existence pleases the Emperor. Your people must be reminded that it is so! Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure to initiate the Touched into the Order of the Hammer and a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは聖コグナティウスの聖遺物によって生まれたので、皇帝を喜ばせていることになります。それを民に思い出させなければなりません！触れられし者を鉄槌の修道会に加入させるための公の洗礼式と、聖コグナティウスとその信者たちの行為についての寓話を朗読するための儀式を手配するのです」
「彼らは聖コグナティウスの聖遺物によって生まれたので、皇帝を喜ばせていることになります。それを民に思い出させなければなりません！触れられし者を鉄槌の修道会に加入させるための公の洗礼式と、聖コグナティウスとその信者たちの行為についての寓話を朗読するための儀式を手配するのです」

languages.text: « Ils ont été enfantés par la relique de Saint Cognatius, et de ce fait, leur existence est un bienfait aux yeux de l'Empereur. La population ne doit pas l'oublier ! Organisez une cérémonie publique d'intronisation monastique des Altérés dans l'Ordre du Marteau, ainsi qu'un service consacré à la lecture de paraboles louant les actes de Saint Cognatius et de ses disciples. »
languages.original_text: "They were begotten by the relic of Saint Cognatius, which means their existence pleases the Emperor. Your people must be reminded that it is so! Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure to initiate the Touched into the Order of the Hammer and a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont été enfantés par la relique de Saint Cognatius, et de ce fait, leur existence est un bienfait aux yeux de l'Empereur. La population ne doit pas l'oublier ! Organisez une cérémonie publique d'intronisation monastique des Altérés dans l'Ordre du Marteau, ainsi qu'un service consacré à la lecture de paraboles louant les actes de Saint Cognatius et de ses disciples. »

languages.text: "Das Relikt des Heiligen Cognatius hat sie hervorgebracht, das heißt, ihre Existenz erfreut den Imperator. "Eure Leute müssen erinnert werden, dass dem so ist! Arrangiert eine öffentliche Tonsurzeremonie, um die Berührten in den Orden des Hammers aufzunehmen, dazu eine religiöse Handlung, bei der die Parabeln über die Taten des Heiligen Cognatius und seiner Anhänger gelesen werden."
languages.original_text: "They were begotten by the relic of Saint Cognatius, which means their existence pleases the Emperor. Your people must be reminded that it is so! Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure to initiate the Touched into the Order of the Hammer and a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."

traits.locale_text: "Das Relikt des Heiligen Cognatius hat sie hervorgebracht, das heißt, ihre Existenz erfreut den Imperator. "Eure Leute müssen erinnert werden, dass dem so ist! Arrangiert eine öffentliche Tonsurzeremonie, um die Berührten in den Orden des Hammers aufzunehmen, dazu eine religiöse Handlung, bei der die Parabeln über die Taten des Heiligen Cognatius und seiner Anhänger gelesen werden."

"Das Relikt des Heiligen Cognatius hat sie hervorgebracht, sie genießen also die Gunst des Imperators. Wir müssen die Leute daran erinnern! Arrangiert eine öffentliche Tonsurzeremonie, um die Berührten in den Orden des Hammers aufzunehmen, dazu eine religiöse Handlung, bei welcher die Parabeln über die Taten des Heiligen Cognatius und seiner Anhänger gelesen werden."

languages.text: "Onlar, Aziz Cognatius'un yadigârından meydana geldi. Bu da varlıklarının İmparator'u memnun ettiği manasına geliyor. İnsanlara bunu hatırlatmalıyız! Mütehassisleri Çekiç Tarikatı mensubu kılmak için herkesin izleyebileceği bir saç kazıma töreni ve Aziz Cognatius ile müritlerinin eylemlerini anlatan hikâyelerin okunacağı bir ayin düzenlensin."
languages.original_text: "They were begotten by the relic of Saint Cognatius, which means their existence pleases the Emperor. Your people must be reminded that it is so! Arrange a public ceremony of tonsure to initiate the Touched into the Order of the Hammer and a service dedicated to reading parables about the acts of Saint Cognatius and his followers."

traits.locale_text: "Onlar, Aziz Cognatius'un yadigârından meydana geldi. Bu da varlıklarının İmparator'u memnun ettiği manasına geliyor. İnsanlara bunu hatırlatmalıyız! Mütehassisleri Çekiç Tarikatı mensubu kılmak için herkesin izleyebileceği bir saç kazıma töreni ve Aziz Cognatius ile müritlerinin eylemlerini anlatan hikâyelerin okunacağı bir ayin düzenlensin."
